member.name: P:BlueWSClient.NET.Net.BlueWebClient.Timeout
member.summary: Gets or sets the length of time, in milliseconds, before the request times out.

member.name: M:BlueWSClient.NET.Net.BlueWebClient.UploadValues(System.String,System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection,BlueWSClient.NET.Net.HttpMethod)
member.summary: Uploads the specified name/value collection to the resource identified by the specified URI.
member.param: The URI of the resource to receive the collection.
The NameValueCollection to send to the resource.
The http method used to send data to the resource. Allowed methods are POST and GET.

member.summary: Override this method if you want to do something when the raw server response is parsed.

member.name: M:BlueWSClient.NET.Requests.Request`1.OnParseFailure(System.Exception)
member.summary: Override this method if you want to do something when the raw server response could not be parsed.
